question: Which of the following is not true about Payments Bank?
option1: Payments bank can issue ATM/debit cards but not credit cards
option2: Payments Bank can give a loan of up to only Rs 1 lakh.
option3: Initial capital required for a Payments Bank is Rs 100 crore
option4: Payments Bank must maintain Cash Reserve Ration (CRR) as decided by RBI.
answer: Payments Bank can give a loan of up to only Rs 1 lakh.
explanation: The banks must maintain CRR, minimum 75% of demand deposits in government bonds of up to one year and maximum 25% in current and fixed deposits with other scheduled commercial banks for operational purposes and liquidity management. Payments Bank are not allowed to give loans of any amount.
